description:
Learn how to design beautiful social media content by designing images for free with no experience.


About This Course

This course will teach you how to use the unknown but amazing program Adobe Spark, which is 100% free (and generally unknown of), to create your social media content.

This program allows you to easily make a design and re-size it for any social media platform. You will learn:

  • Where to find inspiration to make awesome images
  • The best websites for free high quality images with no copyright restrictions
  • How to create a beautiful social media image
  • How to remove the watermark legally and smartly
  • All of this with no design experience required!


What makes this course different?

I take pride in teaching over 3000+ students and having only positive feedback. I take time and care in to ensuring your learning experience is enjoyable and effective.

This course is the only one of its kind that covers how to use this unknown free adobe application and is 100% worth the investment to learn due to what it can provide.


I look forward to teaching you!
title: Social Media Marketing: Effortlessly Design Viral Images
